tool_description: This API provides the largest webcomics data in the world to create a comic site/application such as webtoons.com
name: Webtoon
title: Webtoon

api_list.name: canvas/titles/get-info
api_list.description:
Get comic information
*To load images, please check the tutorial at https://rapidapi.com/apidojo/api/webtoon/tutorials/how-to-load-images

required_parameters.name: titleNo
required_parameters.description: The value of titleNo field returned in .../canvas/titles/list or .../canvas/search or .../canvas/home endpoint

api_list.name: canvas/titles/get-recommend
api_list.description:
Get similar comics
*To load images, please check the tutorial at https://rapidapi.com/apidojo/api/webtoon/tutorials/how-to-load-images

required_parameters.name: titleNo
required_parameters.description: The value of titleNo field returned in .../canvas/titles/list or .../canvas/search or .../canvas/home endpoint

api_list.name: canvas/search
api_list.description:
Search for comics by term or phrase
*To load images, please check the tutorial at https://rapidapi.com/apidojo/api/webtoon/tutorials/how-to-load-images

api_list.name: canvas/genres/list
api_list.description:
List genres in canvas category
*To load images, please check the tutorial at https://rapidapi.com/apidojo/api/webtoon/tutorials/how-to-load-images

api_list.name: canvas/titles/list
api_list.description:
List comics in canvas category
*To load images, please check the tutorial at https://rapidapi.com/apidojo/api/webtoon/tutorials/how-to-load-images

required_parameters.name: genre
required_parameters.description: The value of code field returned in .../canvas/genres/list endpoint.

api_list.name: originals/titles/get-info

required_parameters.name: titleNo

api_list.name: originals/episodes/get-likes
api_list.description: Get likes count of a episode

required_parameters.name: titleNo
required_parameters.description: The value of titleNo field returned in .../originals/titles/list or .../originals/titles/list-by-rank endpoint

required_parameters.name: episodeNo
required_parameters.description: The value of episodeNo field returned in .../originals/episodes/list endpoint.

api_list.name: originals/titles/list-by-rank
api_list.description:
List comics in originals category by ranking
*To load images, please check the tutorial at https://rapidapi.com/apidojo/api/webtoon/tutorials/how-to-load-images

optional_parameters.name: count
optional_parameters.description: The number of comics with highest ranked per genre. Maximum is 30.
